Package  Class  Tree  Deprecated  Index  Help

Package it.bova.rtmapi

Interface Summary
RtmObject This interface require an object to have id and name string fields, accessible by the public getters It is used heavily for RtmObjectBrowser static methods
 

Class Summary
Contact An object for a Remember the Milk contact id - The string unique ID fullname - The full name of the contact username - The username of the contact, used for login
DateParser An utility class for parsing and formattin in ISO8601, the format used by Remember the Milk Server
DeletedTask An object containing relevant information about a deleted task (See SynchedTasks).
Group An object for Remember the Milk groups of contacts id - The string unique ID name - The name label of the group contactIds - A string array with the IDs of contacts contained in the group (See Contact)
Location An object for a Remember the Milk location.
MethodInfo An object containing all the necessary information for a Remember the Milk API method.
Note An object containing a note for Task objects.
Recurrence A class for the definition of a repetition rule for a Task.
RtmApi The standard API, without transactions
RtmApiAuthenticator The API with the methods for getting and checking the server token.
RtmObjects An utility class for searching and extracting inside RtmObject collections
Settings An object containing the user settings stored in the Remember the Milk server.
SynchedTasks A container for synchronization results (See RtmApi for methods including last_sync parameter).
Task A Remember the Milk task.
TaskList The lists for tasks as in Remember the Milk, both non-smart and smart.
Timezone An object containing the timezone information.
Token An object containing the token string and other useful user information.
Transaction<T> A generic container for transactions, including transaction information and the subject of the transaction itself.
 

Enum Summary
Frequency An enum for defining recurrence frequency in tasks (See Recurrence and Task).
Permission An enum for the possible server permissions
Priority An enum for task priorities.
 

Exception Summary
ParsingException An exception for problems with parsing (JSON, dates)
RtmApiException A fatal Exception caused by this API
ServerException An exception message thrown by the Remember the Milk server
